Description: Secure Web Application Infrastructure - Production Ready CloudFormation Template

EnvironmentSuffix.Description: Suffix for resource naming to support multiple deployments
EnvironmentSuffix.ConstraintDescription: Must contain only alphanumeric characters and hyphens

EnvironmentName.ConstraintDescription: Must be one of the allowed values

ProjectName.ConstraintDescription: Must contain only lowercase alphanumeric characters and hyphens

InstanceType.Description: EC2 instance type for web servers

MinSize.Description: Minimum number of instances in Auto Scaling Group

MaxSize.Description: Maximum number of instances in Auto Scaling Group

DesiredCapacity.Description: Desired number of instances in Auto Scaling Group

DBName.ConstraintDescription: Must start with a letter and contain only alphanumeric characters and underscores

DBUsername.ConstraintDescription: Must start with a letter and contain only alphanumeric characters and underscores

KeyPairName.Description: Name of an existing EC2 KeyPair to enable SSH access (leave empty for no SSH access)
KeyPairName.ConstraintDescription: Must be empty or a valid key pair name

ExistingCloudTrailName.Description: Name of existing CloudTrail to use (leave empty to create new CloudTrail)
ExistingCloudTrailName.ConstraintDescription: Must be empty or a valid CloudTrail name

ExistingVPCId.Description: ID of existing VPC to use
ExistingVPCId.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid VPC ID

ExistingInternetGatewayId.Description: ID of existing Internet Gateway to use
ExistingInternetGatewayId.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid Internet Gateway ID

Statement.Sid: Allow CloudFormation to use the key
